name: WhoseTurntask
0:
”Alexa, open art random draw”
”Alexa, ask art random draw who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art random draw
des: Next time you're trying to decide what turn it is pick something or perform a task, just ask Alexa for help. For example, if you're trying to decide whose turn it is to pick a movie on movie night, Alexa can randomly select something from the list. Or if you're trying to decide when should take out the trash, Alexa can help with that too!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
